fullText: Adrienne Warren delivers a powerhouse performance that captures both Turner's volcanic energy and her vulnerability, making this biographical musical an electrifying experience.
dtliExcerpt: Adrienne Warren delivers a powerhouse performance that captures both Turner's volcanic energy and her vulnerability, making this biographical musical an electrifying experience.
bwwExcerpt: If you aim to embody the indomitable spirit of a beloved subject named not once but twice in the title of her celebratory bio-musical, you better be up to the challenge. Adrienne Warren has what it takes, and then some - the powerhouse voice, the jackhammer legs, the wild dance moves, and above all, the heart - to carry Tina: The Tina Turner Musical across the rough patches of its clunky book and uneven direction. This grit-and-glitter production is neither the best nor the worst (RIP, Donna Sum
